translations.target: Sheet1
Coffee with a Touch of Sugar
Female-oriented

translations.source:
神秘人李元硕，为了给昏迷不醒的儿子报仇，特重金雇佣了国际赏金猎人——李明哲去折磨伤害他儿子的女人甯佳，因为李元硕并不知道儿子是一厢情愿的事实，怀恨久已的李元硕开始他的报复行动——要让甯佳尝尝被所爱之人抛弃的悲伤。
真相是李元硕的儿子疯狂追求甯佳，甯佳委婉拒绝了。珺妍怕李元硕儿子纠缠甯佳，撒谎说，甯佳已经订婚了。李元硕儿子听到珺妍的话心情低落。在过马路的时候，不幸被车撞伤，至今躺在医院未醒，虽然不是甯佳所伤，但是要不是她，李元硕的儿子不会遇到车祸。
一个天生拥有资源懂得人性的男人，自然而然的会把每一个女人看成自己的猎物，在目的的驱使下接近女人，但往往高级的猎人都是以猎物的形态出现的......最后谁赢了？
translations.target:
The mysterious Li Yuanshuo, seeking revenge for his comatose son, spends a fortune to hire an international bounty hunter—Li Mingzhe—to torment and hurt Ning Jia, the woman he believes wronged his son. Unaware that his son’s feelings were one-sided, Li Yuanshuo, consumed by long-held resentment, begins his retaliation—determined to make Ning Jia taste the heartbreak of being abandoned by the one she loves.

The truth is that Li Yuanshuo’s son obsessively pursued Ning Jia, and she turned him down tactfully. Fearing he would continue to pester her, Junyan lied and said Ning Jia was already engaged. Hearing this, Li Yuanshuo’s son sank into despair. While crossing the street, he was tragically struck by a car and has remained unconscious in the hospital ever since. Although Ning Jia did not cause his injuries, Li Yuanshuo believes that if not for her, his son would never have suffered the accident.

A man born with resources and a keen understanding of human nature will instinctively treat every woman as prey, approaching them with purpose—yet the most dangerous hunters often appear in the guise of prey... In the end, who wins?
The Humble Scholar
Male-oriented

translations.source: 身为理工男的王宇被拜金女抛弃后发生了车祸，意外穿越到大康王朝迷糊间醒来，发现自己躺在一间茅草屋内。此时的大康人丁凋敝，为了增加人口，村长召集村里的未婚壮丁进行选妻，王宇对李兮若一见钟情，两人成为夫妻，但是前身是败家子的王宇却一贫如洗，恰逢恶霸刘有财前来讨债，王宇凭借后世丰富的经验，不断发家致富，带领村民与恶霸刘有财，恶少刘建业斗智斗勇，发明了一系列新颖的产品和政策，改变了大康的国运
translations.target: After being dumped by a gold-digging girlfriend, Wang Yu—a science-and-engineering guy—gets into a car accident and unexpectedly transmigrates to the Great Kang Dynasty. When he comes to, he finds himself lying in a thatched hut. Great Kang is sparsely populated, and to boost the population, the village head gathers unmarried able-bodied men to choose wives. Wang Yu falls in love with Li Xiruo at first sight, and the two become husband and wife. However, the original owner of this body was a wastrel, leaving Wang Yu penniless. Just then, the local bully Liu Youcai arrives to collect debts. Relying on his knowledge and experience from the modern era, Wang Yu builds wealth step by step, leads the villagers in outsmarting Liu Youcai and the scoundrel Liu Jianye, invents a series of innovative products and policies, and ultimately changes Great Kang’s national fortunes.
The CEO’s Overwhelming Windfall
Male-oriented

translations.source: 凌氏与上官家族订婚宴上，凌霄被杀手刺杀倒在血泊中，在一阵眩光后，凌霄穿越回到了5年前的慈善晚会上，但是不巧的是穿越到的是平行世界，那个世界的凌霄是个公认的废材，私生子凌云目前掌管着凌氏集团的各个项目，就在凌云和文旅项目负责人唐德谈话时，凌霄阻止了项目进程，并且预言了项目会迁址。凌霄一回到凌氏集团就开始整顿公司风气，把公司蛮横的关系户都逐出公司，这一次将重建凌公子的雄风。
translations.target: At the engagement banquet between the Ling and Shangguan families, Ling Xiao is assassinated and collapses in a pool of blood. After a flash of blinding light, he is transported back to a charity gala five years earlier—only to discover he has landed in a parallel world. In that world, Ling Xiao is a universally acknowledged good-for-nothing, while the illegitimate son Ling Yun currently controls every project of the Ling Group. When Ling Yun is speaking with Tang De, the person in charge of a cultural tourism project, Ling Xiao steps in to halt the project and predicts it will be relocated. The moment Ling Xiao returns to the Ling Group, he begins cleaning up the company’s culture, driving out the arrogant nepotistic insiders. This time, he will rebuild Young Master Ling’s former glory.

translations.source: 白日偷欢总裁又野又欲
translations.target: Stolen Pleasure in Broad Daylight: The CEO Is Wild and Insatiable
Female-oriented

translations.source: 夏谨微因为爱慕季司辰，以和季司辰结婚为条件答应给季司辰的白月光顾瑶瑶捐肾，本以为结了婚就可以和季司辰绑在一起，但随后而来的是父亲离去，被迫捐肾等痛苦，夏谨微痛苦抽离时，季司辰却对夏谨微的感情发生了变化。
translations.target: Because she is in love with Ji Sicheng, Xia Jinwei agrees to donate a kidney to Gu Yaoyao—Ji Sicheng’s “white moonlight”—on the condition that he marries her. She believes that once they are married, she will be bound to him for life. Instead, she is met with one blow after another: her father’s death, the agony of being forced to donate a kidney, and more. When Xia Jinwei finally tears herself away in pain, Ji Sicheng’s feelings toward her begin to change.
Traveled to Ancient Times to Snatch the Crown Prince
Male-oriented

translations.source: 保安穿越古代废材太子张标，面对嫔妃与下人私通，他雷厉风行，用穿越一起带来的电棍解决下人，正欲对付嫔妃，皇后竟出现，带着打手想要先发制人，让自己这个太子背上莫须有的罪名，张标不再忍让，用电棍打败众人。可皇后一计不成，竟联合上柱国齐泰迷晕皇上，想要废了张标这个太子，危急之时，皇上醒来，屏退众人，垂问张标治国良方，以考验他。张标语出惊人，得以掌控朝中大全，他雷厉风行，抄没四大粮商，赈济灾民，正式与上柱国齐泰对抗。
translations.target: A security guard transmigrates into the body of Zhang Biao, a useless crown prince in ancient times. When he discovers a concubine having an affair with a servant, he acts decisively, using the electric baton he brought with him through time to deal with the servant. Just as he is about to confront the concubine, the empress suddenly appears with her thugs, trying to strike first and pin a baseless charge on the crown prince. Zhang Biao refuses to back down and defeats them with the baton. When her first scheme fails, the empress joins forces with the Grand Pillar of the State, Qi Tai, to drug the emperor and abolish Zhang Biao as crown prince. In the crisis, the emperor awakens, dismisses the others, and questions Zhang Biao on statecraft to test him. Zhang Biao’s astonishing answers earn him control over court affairs. He moves with iron-handed efficiency, confiscates the assets of the four major grain merchants, provides disaster relief, and formally enters into open confrontation with Qi Tai.

translations.source: 嫡女重生权臣的掌心宠
translations.target: Reborn Legitimate Daughter: The Power Minister’s Darling
Female-oriented

translations.source: 前世柳如湘19岁嫁入将军府，在新婚夜就收到了夫君的死讯，一个人辛苦经营者整个家族，还被婆婆百般刁难，后得知夫君竟是假死，重生后开始真正做自己，与严沐最终走到一起
translations.target: In her previous life, Liu Ruxiang married into the General’s Manor at nineteen, only to receive news of her husband’s death on their wedding night. She struggled alone to keep the entire family afloat while enduring endless torment from her mother-in-law. Later she learned her husband had merely faked his death. Reborn, Liu Ruxiang finally begins to live for herself—and ultimately finds her way to Yan Mu.
Ultimate Showdown: Shattering the Dragon King
Male-oriented

translations.source: 富二代顾少霆被前妻和龙王设计套走家产致死，重生之后开启了追击龙王之路。联合凤王，麒麟王彻底颠覆了龙王一手遮天的挑战，在这其中也付出了巨大的代价。但也收货了自己的爱情。
translations.target: Second-generation rich heir Gu Shaoting is set up by his ex-wife and the Dragon King, swindled out of his family fortune, and killed. After being reborn, he embarks on a relentless pursuit of the Dragon King. Joining forces with the Phoenix King and the Qilin King, he takes on the challenge of overthrowing the Dragon King’s all-powerful reign. The price is enormous—but he also finds love along the way.
The Top-Idol Young Madam: Beautiful and Badass
Female-oriented

translations.source: 清白被神秘男人夺走，她被父亲赶出门，五年后，她带着儿子低调回归
translations.target: Her Innocence Stolen by a Mysterious Man, Cast Out by Her Father—Five Years Later, She Returns Low-Key with Her Son
Extreme War God: Battle Emperor Awakening
Male-oriented

translations.source: 斗皇冷无道出狱后，遇到大小姐沈情，一步步帮助她化解前进道路上的困难，，最终走到一起
translations.target: After Battle Emperor Leng Wudao is released from prison, he meets the heiress Shen Qing and helps her overcome the obstacles on her path step by step, eventually ending up together.

translations.source: 撩完就跑 宁小姐不想负责
translations.target: Flirt and Run: Miss Ning Doesn’t Want to Take Responsibility
Female-oriented

translations.source: 三年前，宁熙和裴轻寒分手，并且打掉了孩子。曾经的文艺女神一朝陨落，被贴上拜金、世俗、恶毒等等标签。三年后重逢，裴轻寒是收购她公司的大老板，而她只是为生计奔波的小销售。一纸调令，宁熙被调去集团总部，直属上司还是大老板的“绯闻女友”，她只能使出三头六臂在夹缝中求生存。可随着裴轻寒步步逼近，她藏了好久的秘密终于包不住了。裴轻寒做梦也没想到，那个被“打掉的孩子”，竟然会死而复生，抱着他叫爸爸
translations.target: Three years ago, Ning Xi broke up with Pei Qinghan and had an abortion. The former literary goddess fell from grace overnight, branded as materialistic, vulgar, vicious, and more. Three years later they meet again: Pei Qinghan is the powerful boss who is acquiring her company, while she is merely a small-time saleswoman struggling to make a living. A transfer order sends Ning Xi to the group headquarters—where her direct supervisor turns out to be the big boss’s “rumored girlfriend.” She can only fight tooth and nail to survive in the cracks. But as Pei Qinghan closes in step by step, the secret she has buried for so long can no longer be contained. Pei Qinghan never imagined that the “aborted child” would return from the dead—throwing his arms around him and calling him Dad.
Love and Hate of That Lifetime
Female-oriented

translations.source: 顾芊芊突然发现自己以为的好姐妹和好老公都为了钱在骗自己，意外死亡后发现死对头居然一直暗恋自己，看她逆风翻盘，最终爱情事业双丰收。
translations.target: Gu Qianqian suddenly discovers that the “best friend” and “good husband” she trusted have both been deceiving her for money. After an unexpected death, she learns that her nemesis has actually been secretly in love with her all along. Watch her fight back against the odds, flip the board, and ultimately win both love and career.
Your World, My Rules
Female-oriented

translations.source: 孙薇一直觉得自己生活的世界有BUG，事实上孙薇的猜测是正确的，她活在漫画世界里，而她发现的那些BUG，是因为漫画作者改了原先的设定。由于孙薇苏醒了自我意识，导致她找到了世界之门，穿越到了现实世界中，认识了她的造物主，漫画作者李洋，由此开展了一段动人心魄的别样旅程。
translations.target: Sun Wei has always felt that the world she lives in has bugs. In fact, she is right: she lives inside a comic book, and the “bugs” she notices exist because the comic’s author changed the original settings. As Sun Wei awakens self-awareness, she finds the door between worlds, crosses into reality, and meets her creator—the comic author Li Yang—thus beginning a breathtaking journey unlike any other.
From Underdog to Tycoon
Male-oriented

translations.source: 长林集团总裁李长林被副总裁马天成下药毒死，穿越到了农村青年李小林身上，即将成为村霸陶海的女婿。就在婚礼即将走到最后一步时，身为青梅竹马的李明月跳出来，中断了这场入赘的闹剧。同时，李长林从电视上的得知，害死自己得的马天成当上了长林集团的董事长，重活一世的李长林发誓报仇。
translations.target: Li Changlin, CEO of Changlin Group, is drugged and poisoned to death by Vice President Ma Tiancheng. He transmigrates into the body of a rural young man, Li Xiaolin, who is about to become the son-in-law of the village tyrant Tao Hai. Just as the wedding is about to reach its final step, his childhood sweetheart Li Mingyue bursts in and interrupts the farcical “marriage-into-the-family” arrangement. At the same time, Li Changlin learns from the TV that Ma Tiancheng—the man who killed him—has become chairman of Changlin Group. Given a second life, Li Changlin vows revenge.
Delivering Takeout in Ancient Times
Male-oriented

translations.source: 外卖小哥小帅穿越到了传说中的女儿国，未见过男人的女儿国将军月色对小帅的身体展开了奇妙的探索，最后将小帅上交给了国王。国王根据唐僧的古老传说判断男人是女儿国的灾星，决定处死小帅，但在宰相花容的据理力争之下，留下了一条小命，小帅从此便假扮成了女人生活在女儿国中，遭遇了一系列令人啼笑皆非的故事。
translations.target: A delivery guy, Xiao Shuai, transmigrates to the legendary Kingdom of Women. The kingdom’s general, Yue Se—who has never seen a man—conducts a curious “examination” of his body and ultimately hands him over to the queen. Based on an ancient legend about Tang Monk, the queen concludes that men are harbingers of disaster and decides to execute Xiao Shuai. However, thanks to Chancellor Hua Rong’s reasoned defense, his life is spared. From then on, Xiao Shuai disguises himself as a woman and lives in the Kingdom of Women, stumbling into a series of laugh-out-loud misadventures.
Insist on Marrying You
Female-oriented

translations.source: 沈敬身为玉清门大师兄却始终无法修炼功法，即将入赘给玉虚门的公主。此时却遇上明月宫少主萧林昆上门砸场，沈敬被神秘光球击中，觉醒了神功，救下了师妹轻舞。两人结伴去往玉虚门提亲，路上却遇到邪教杀生，沈敬和轻舞就此卷入一场阴谋之中。
translations.target: Shen Jing, the senior disciple of the Yuqing Sect, has never been able to cultivate its techniques and is about to marry into the Yuxu Sect as the princess’s husband. At this moment, Xiao Linkun, the young lord of Mingyue Palace, comes to cause trouble. Shen Jing is struck by a mysterious sphere of light, awakens a divine skill, and saves his junior sister Qingwu. The two travel together to the Yuxu Sect to propose marriage, but along the way they run into a murderous evil cult—dragging Shen Jing and Qingwu into a sprawling conspiracy.
My Wife Became a Big Shot
Male-oriented

translations.source: 六年前，李薇和萧晨风还是一对恩爱的夫妻，直到萧晨风的老友安然回国，安然的伪装出一幅善良的面孔，和李薇成为了朋友，暗中却谋划除掉李薇上位。不久，李薇怀孕，萧晨风却被医生告知李薇肚子里的孩子并不存在血缘关系，李薇就此打入冷宫，萧晨风与安然渐渐眉来眼去。六年后，李薇的儿子小睿白血病病危，只有萧晨风的骨髓能救他，为了讨好萧晨风，李薇不得不向安然低下了头，在相处中，却逐渐接近亲生儿子变绿帽的真相。
translations.target: Six years ago, Li Wei and Xiao Chenfeng were still a loving married couple—until Xiao Chenfeng’s old friend An Ran returned to the country. Wearing a mask of kindness, An Ran became Li Wei’s friend while secretly plotting to eliminate her and take her place. Soon Li Wei became pregnant, but Xiao Chenfeng was told by a doctor that the child in her womb was not biologically his. Li Wei was cast aside, and Xiao Chenfeng and An Ran grew increasingly intimate. Six years later, Li Wei’s son Xiao Rui is critically ill with leukemia, and only Xiao Chenfeng’s bone marrow can save him. To please Xiao Chenfeng, Li Wei has no choice but to bow her head to An Ran—yet as they spend time together, she gradually draws closer to the truth behind the “cuckolded biological son” mystery.
The Wife’s Comeback
Female-oriented

translations.source: 江家大小姐江绾为傅氏集团总裁傅司宴生下了一个女儿傅星洲，却在出生时被自己的妹妹——江家养女江曼偷去，变成了江曼的女儿。傅司宴为了救治傅星洲的白血病，强迫江绾怀上了第二个孩子，可江曼担心江绾生下一个健康的孩子，自己将永远无法把江绾从傅司宴身边赶走，于是用计让江绾流产。江绾在得知自己两个孩子一个重病，一个未出生便夭折之后，复仇的怒火已无法遏制。
translations.target: Jiang Wan, the Jiang family’s eldest daughter, bears a daughter—Fu Xingzhou—for Fu Siyan, CEO of the Fu Group. Yet at birth, her own younger sister—Jiang Man, the Jiang family’s adopted daughter—steals the baby and raises her as Jiang Man’s child. To treat Fu Xingzhou’s leukemia, Fu Siyan forces Jiang Wan to conceive a second child. But Jiang Man fears that if Jiang Wan gives birth to a healthy baby, she will never be able to drive Jiang Wan away from Fu Siyan, so she schemes to make Jiang Wan miscarry. When Jiang Wan learns that one of her children is gravely ill and the other died before birth, her fury for revenge becomes impossible to contain.
A Devastating Love
Female-oriented

translations.source: 苏沫璃为了抢夺王后之位，偷走了妹妹和太子的定情信物，和奸臣一起把妹妹苏念鱼害死，强迫其喝下毒酒，就在苏念鱼死的一瞬间，电闪雷鸣，一切都穿越回到了苏念鱼18岁那年，苏沫璃还是处处刁难，太子终于出手了，救下了苏念鱼，这一次苏念鱼要拿回属于自己的一切
translations.target: To seize the position of queen, Su Moli steals the token of love between her younger sister and the crown prince. Teaming up with a treacherous minister, she brings about her sister Su Nianyu’s death and forces her to drink poisoned wine. In the very instant Su Nianyu dies, lightning splits the sky—and everything rewinds to the year she is eighteen. Su Moli continues to make trouble at every turn, but this time the crown prince finally intervenes and saves Su Nianyu. Now Su Nianyu will reclaim everything that rightfully belongs to her.
The Young Master’s Secret-Marriage “Sinner” Wife
Female-oriented

translations.source: 一年前，已经怀孕的云海集团董事长楚云汐和顾氏集团公子顾瀚霖的婚礼上，顾家二公子顾翰熙拿出了顾瀚霖无法生育的体检报告，指责楚云汐怀上了别人的孩子，楚云汐的表妹梁枫玥更是拿出了楚云汐的艳照来煽风点火。顾瀚霖一怒之下，将楚云汐肚子里的孩子打流产，楚云汐也被气成了植物人。只有她的私人医生许州州依然悉心照料楚云汐，直到一年后楚云汐从昏迷中醒来，发誓要向诬陷她的人复仇。
translations.target: A year ago, at the wedding of Chu Yunxi—the pregnant chairwoman of Yunhai Group—and Gu Hanlin, the young master of the Gu Group, Gu Hanlin’s younger brother Gu Hanxi produced a medical report claiming Gu Hanlin was infertile and accused Chu Yunxi of carrying another man’s child. Chu Yunxi’s cousin Liang Fengyue even brought out Chu Yunxi’s revealing photos to fan the flames. In a rage, Gu Hanlin forced Chu Yunxi to miscarry, and Chu Yunxi was so devastated that she became vegetative. Only her private doctor, Xu Zhouzhou, continued to care for her devotedly—until a year later, when Chu Yunxi awakens from her coma and swears revenge on those who framed her.
Rise of the God King
Male-oriented

translations.source: 凤澜被黑道大姐陈舒婷挟持，强行让凤澜做风俗行业。秦枫看出凤澜的困境，前来相救，神君萧千城赏识秦枫，收留了他与凤澜。可不久，秦枫遭到组织背叛，好不容易逃了出来，伤势过重晕了过去，被苏晚晴所救，可为了让苏晚晴不受牵连，他选择离开。五年后，他掌控大权，这次他来迎娶苏晚晴，却发现她正被家族刁难,他不再忍让。
translations.target: Feng Lan is kidnapped by the underworld boss Chen Shuting and forced into the adult entertainment trade. Qin Feng sees Feng Lan’s predicament and comes to rescue her. The divine lord Xiao Qiancheng takes a liking to Qin Feng and takes both him and Feng Lan in. But soon after, Qin Feng is betrayed by his organization. He narrowly escapes, only to collapse from severe injuries and be saved by Su Wanqing. To keep Su Wanqing from being implicated, he chooses to leave. Five years later, having risen to power, he returns to marry Su Wanqing—only to find her being bullied by her family. This time, he will not tolerate it.

translations.source: 盛总 夫人回来要诛心
translations.target: President Sheng: When the Madam Returns, She’ll Strike Where It Hurts
Female-oriented

translations.source: 宁浅浅，一个曾被爱包围的女子，她的生活原本充满了幸福和希望。然而，当她爱上盛景澜，一切美好瞬间化为泡影。在这段关系中，宁浅浅不仅被迫流产，失去了未出生的孩子，还经历了家破人亡的悲剧。这一切的打击让她痛不欲生，仿佛整个世界都陷入了黑暗。在绝望中，宁浅浅选择了最极端的方式——烈火焚身，以假死的方式逃离了这个充满了痛苦的世界。她的身体在火中化为灰烬，但她的意志并未随之消散。在死亡的边缘，宁浅浅重新找回了自己的意志和力量，她决定重生归来，誓要为自己和未出生的孩子讨回公道。
translations.target: Ning Qianqian was once a woman surrounded by love, her life full of happiness and hope. But the moment she fell in love with Sheng Jinglan, everything beautiful shattered in an instant. In that relationship, Ning Qianqian was not only forced to miscarry and lose her unborn child—she also suffered the tragedy of her family’s ruin and deaths. The blows left her in unbearable agony, as if the entire world had fallen into darkness. In despair, Ning Qianqian chose the most extreme path—setting herself on fire and escaping this painful world through a staged death. Her body turned to ashes in the flames, yet her will did not vanish. On the edge of death, she regains her resolve and strength. She decides to return, reborn—swearing to seek justice for herself and her unborn child.
The Strongest Top Scholar in History
Male-oriented

translations.source: 男主在宾馆与女友亲热时，被雷劈中，化身为魏辰，身处古代天子殿。魏辰是魏府老爷酒醉后和婢女许晴生下的儿子，受尽凌辱，但高中状元。皇后为扶其侄子登状元之位，污蔑魏辰抄袭，下令将魏辰斩首。
translations.target: While getting intimate with his girlfriend in a hotel, the male lead is struck by lightning and becomes Wei Chen, awakening in the emperor’s palace in ancient times. Wei Chen is the son of the Wei household’s master and the maid Xu Qing, conceived in a drunken encounter. He suffers relentless humiliation—yet goes on to place first in the imperial examinations. To help her nephew seize the top scholar’s position, the empress frames Wei Chen for plagiarism and orders his execution.
Agent Phoenix
Female-oriented

translations.source: 三年前，翟灵在网上闺蜜的引诱下，带着亲生妹妹翟曼云前往了诈骗者的天堂北三角。姐妹二人被当地诈骗团伙头目野狼双双逮捕，抓到园区后才发现，被骗的不止她们两个，连她们失踪的父母，也被囚禁于此。野狼用父母的命胁迫姐妹两服从，最后却出尔反尔，让翟父翟母变成了尸体。翟家姐妹就此被卖到了北三角地头蛇沈天年的地盘，在那里，翟灵遇到了改变一生的贵人。
translations.target: Three years ago, lured by an online “bestie,” Zhai Ling takes her biological younger sister, Zhai Manyun, to the Northern Triangle—a paradise for scammers. The two sisters are captured by Wild Wolf, the leader of a local fraud gang. Only after being taken into the compound do they realize they are not the only victims—their missing parents are also imprisoned there. Wild Wolf uses their parents’ lives to force the sisters into submission, but in the end he goes back on his word and leaves Mr. and Mrs. Zhai as corpses. The Zhai sisters are then sold to the territory of the Northern Triangle’s local kingpin, Shen Tiannian—where Zhai Ling meets a benefactor who will change her life.
